criticism: The withdraw function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. This can be exploited by the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The burn function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. This can be exploited by the owner to burn a specific amount of the total supply of the tokens.
The distr function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. This can be exploited by the owner to distribute a specific amount of the total supply of the tokens.
The transferFrom function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. This can be exploited by the owner to transfer a specific amount of the total supply of the tokens.
